adrFormatAddress: 125 Barclay St # 600, New York, NY 10007-2233, USA

originalText.text:
Local 375 under the leadership of its President the Hon.  Michael Troman has instilled professionalism and true dedication by its members and their families. The local represents over 5 thousand professionals of various trades who proudly serve the 8.5 million residents of New York City. Local 375 through its chapters have a 80 plus year history of assisting in the building and rebuilding of the City's infrastructure. The Local  with all Union's helped to protect and build the Middle Class and has provided others with the opportunity to be elevated to better lives. Local 375 working with District Council 37 which is the largest Municipal Union within the City of New York and is lead by the Hon. Henry Garrido, continues to provide the skills, talent and commitment through its members making New York City greater than it has ever been.
God Bless our Unions.
Dr. Paul-Michael Kazas.

originalText.text: Great union. Fights against privatization if professional workers. Represents NYC civil service workers
